main event: On 1 December 1958, three engineers observed a UFO in Matawan, New Jersey, which initially appeared as a jet trail and vanished after two minutes.
interesting points: The observers described the object as white and inclined at an angle of 60 degrees to the horizon., The object changed positions and eventually became a small white dot before disappearing., The detailed observation lasted about two minutes., The observers were engineers from the Industrial Washing Machine Corp., The report concludes various possibilities including it being a balloon or a contrail.
sighted object: an object resembling a jet trail
witness description: engineers employed by the Industrial Washing Machine Corp.
